description: Specify a name for your ODF storage cluster.
name: ocs-cluster-name

description: The MON storage size (in Gibibytes). The default value is '20Gi'.
name: mon-size

description: The OSD storage size (in Gibibytes). The default value is '100Gi'.
name: osd-size

description: The number of OSDs. The default value is '1'.
name: num-of-osd

description: The IP addresses of the worker nodes where you want to deploy ODF. The minimum number of worker nodes is 3.
name: worker-nodes

description: Set to 'true' if you want to upgrade the ODF version.
name: odf-upgrade

description: The billing type for your ODF configuration.
name: billing-type

description: The IBM COS regional public endpoint.
name: ibm-cos-endpoint

description: The IBM COS access key ID (HMAC keys).
name: ibm-cos-access-key

description: The IBM COS secret access key (HMAC keys).
name: ibm-cos-secret-key

description: Satellite link for private container endpoint.
displayname: Satellite link for private container endpoint
name: container-private-endpoint

description: IAM API Key for storage secret.
displayname: IAM API Key for storage secret
name: iam-api-key
